Subject: [PATCH 16/17] Only include <alloca.h> for Linux (Certainly not for
 NetBSD)

 1 file changed, 2 insertions(+)

--- a/cloudfsapi.c
+++ b/cloudfsapi.c

 #include <stdlib.h>
 #include <sys/stat.h>
+#ifdef __linux__
 #include <alloca.h>
+#endif
 #include <pthread.h>
 #include <time.h>
 #include <unistd.h>
